scripts.build-commonjs: yarpm run build-prefix --out-dir dist/commonjs --plugins '@babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs' src && yarpm run declare-commonjs
scripts.build-systemjs: yarpm run build-prefix --out-dir dist/systemjs --plugins '@babel/plugin-transform-modules-systemjs' src && yarpm run declare-systemjs
scripts.build-amd: yarpm run build-prefix --out-dir dist/amd --plugins '@babel/plugin-transform-modules-amd' src && yarpm run declare-amd
scripts.build-umd: yarpm run build-prefix --out-dir dist/umd --plugins '@babel/plugin-transform-modules-umd' src && yarpm run declare-umd
scripts.build-es2015: yarpm run build-prefix --out-dir dist/es2015 src && yarpm run declare-es2015
scripts.build: yarpm run lint && yarpm test && yarpm run build-commonjs && yarpm run build-systemjs && yarpm run build-amd && yarpm run build-umd && yarpm run build-es2015 && yarpm run declare
scripts.declare: yarpm run declare-commonjs &&yarpm run declare-systemjs && yarpm run declare-amd && yarpm run declare-umd && yarpm run declare-es2015
scripts.test: yarpm run lint && yarpm run coverage --statements 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --lines 100 --report-dir .coverage --include src jasmine
